full_summary:
# GPS Tracking Software for Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
## Overview
Canada Border Services Agency requires a GPS tracking software for on-premise installation on CBSA-owned servers. The software will serve as a real-time GPS and digital device monitoring platform.

## Tender Details
### Reference Number
 SSC-23-00021897:T

### Solicitation Number
 BPM018231/21897

### Tender Closing Date
March 3rd, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Contracting Entity
 Shared Services Canada

### End User Entity
 Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)

### Contracting Authority
 Raiyane Benchekroun
raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
 (613) 324 4061

### Attachment
Further details regarding the requirement and solicitation can be accessed through the following P2P portal link:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/bpm/process_manage_extranet/16443

## Tender Description
The CBSA requires a GPS tracking software for monitoring devices in real-time. The software must be installed on-premise on CBSA-owned servers. In addition to technical requirements, the software vendor must also be able to ensure the security and integrity of the data in accordance with government standards.

## Trade and Regions
The solicitation is applicable to Canadian companies that can provide goods or services for the Canadian market. The software is required for use in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Important Dates
* Amendment Date: March 2nd, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 3rd, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## Contact Information
If you have any inquiries or questions regarding the tender, please do not hesitate to contact the contracting authority:
 Raiyane Benchekroun
raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
 (613) 324 4061

Please note that the solicitation is available for access through the P2P portal link provided above. We look forward to receiving the proposals from interested vendors.
`<xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx>`x0`.
